title: Slum Rehabilitation area shall also mean any area declared as such by the SRA though preferably fulfilling conditions laid down in section 4 of the Slum Act, to qualify as slum area and/or required for implementation of any slum rehabilitation project
clause_text: Slum Rehabilitation area shall also mean any area declared as such by the SRA though preferably fulfilling conditions laid down in section 4 of the Slum Act, to qualify as slum area and/or required for implementation of any slum rehabilitation project. Any area
section: Definition of Slum, Pavement, and Structure of hut

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
